name: Prismatic Ancient Dragon
movement: walking speed of 50 feet and climbing speed of 40 feet
description: This prismatic dragon boasts a gargantuan form and a striking presence, using its powerful physical attacks combined with magical abilities.
memorable: Possesses a potent Breath Weapon that can deal multiple damage types and has the unique ability to frighten foes.
goals: To dominate the battlefield and instill fear in its enemies.
relations: Often encountered along with other draconic creatures or as a lord of a dragon lair.
environment: Typically found in mountainous regions or ancient castle ruins.
strengths: Immune to radiant damage and conditions that would blind it, with exceptional durability and a high passive perception.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes it less evasive against fast attacks.
attacks: Employs a Multiattack consisting of a frightful presence, a powerful bite, two slashing claw attacks, and a bludgeoning tail strike.
most_powerful_ability: Its Breath Weapon can deal vast amounts of radiant damage or a variety of elemental damage types, depending on the choice made.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a remarkable passive perception of 27.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, indicating acute sensory abilities.
additional_information: Can recharge its Breath Weapon on a roll of 5 or 6.
Has access to formidable spells, including the prismatic wall, usable once per day.
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws multiple times daily.
Can blind creatures with its Shimmering Wings legendary action.
Frightful Presence can intimidate foes within a 120-foot radius.
spellcasting: At will, can cast charm person, dancing lights, and prismatic spray, with the prismatic wall available once per day.
test_queries: dragon that uses radiant breath weapon
monster with frightful presence and magic
ancient dragon with multiple damage types
powerful dragon that can blind enemies
